meanings.definition: A shelter for a car consisting of a roof supported by posts.
meanings.sent1: The carports in our neighborhood keep vehicles safe from the rain.
meanings.sent2: Many houses in the area have carports instead of garages.
meanings.sent3: When it started pouring, the carports became the most popular spots in the street.
meanings.sent4: The carports stood like vigilant guardians over the cars parked beneath them.
meanings.sent5: The carports were a welcome sight after a long day of driving.

meanings.sent1: We decided to carport our vehicle to shield it from the sun.
meanings.sent2: The company offered to carport our car for a reasonable fee.
meanings.sent3: I will carport your car so you don't have to worry about it getting too hot.
meanings.sent4: She diligently carports every car that comes in for maintenance.
meanings.sent5: Carporting the cars is an essential part of our service.
